short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and easy to use tool that converts Krutidev font to Unicode (Hindi).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will convert Krutidev text in Unicode format. It has an easy to use dashboard.

Just paste or write Krutidev text in above textarea and click on "Convert To Unicode" button.

Now, copy or share the converted text.
